title: TV5Monde Thalassa 2015 L aventure de L Hermione PDTV x264 AAC MV
description:
L'aventure de L'Hermione

History Documentary hosted by Georges Pernoud, published by TV5Monde broadcasted as part of TV5Monde Thalassa series in 2015 - French narration. 
http://docuwiki.net/images/3/39/L-aventure-de-L-Hermione-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------
The adventure of L'Hermione.

Assembling the crew was an adventure when seeking 21st century artisans capable of doing 18th century work. Twenty years earlier, a group of friends decided to reconstruct an identical replica of the ship that LaFayette fled to during the American revolution in 1780.
